nodes.text: The Mila was one of the four akias of Aramandi society. They were based on the planet Aram, as well as the Mila system. The akia colonized the Mila system after the Galactic Empire was established.

The Mila were liberal and businesslike, and were generally well liked by other Aramandi. It was the Mila who managed to come up with the new interpretation of the Eeronon to account for the existence of off-worlders. However, as a consequence, many of their number broke from the akia and formed the bulk of the Seelas. Members of the Mila akia dressed in bright, jumpsuit-like clothes.
